licence_overview:
To promote or make charitable house to house collections in Northern Ireland, you require a licence from the [Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI).](http://www.psni.police.uk/ "Police Service of Northern Ireland (PSNI)"){:rel="external"}

 Apply to the PSNI station in the area in which the collection is to be made.

Limited exceptions apply when a licence will not be required.

*[PSNI]: Police Service of Northern Ireland
licence_short_description: Licence to promote or make charitable house to house collections in Northern Ireland.
overview: You need a licence to promote or make charitable house to house collections in Northern Ireland
title: House to house charitable collections licence (Northern Ireland)
